aboutMe:
I'm a Full Stack developer with experience in Front-End (JavaScript, HTML, CSS, AngularJs) and Back-End (PHP, Laravel, Sql, Apache). 
 I've a broad understanding of programming logic and a facility for learn new programming skills.
 I worked on several web development projects, client and server side. I also have experience in database design and development, and in the implementation of security systems in web applications. 

 In addition, I consider myself a proactive and collaborative person, always willing to help to my colleagues and to find creative solutions to the problems that arise.
 I am currently looking for opportunities to apply my skills in a dynamic and challenging environment, where I can continue learning and growing professionally as a Full Stack developer.
